Simulation¶

Simulating bulk expression profile

deside.simulation.simulated_bulk_gep_generator(n_per_gradient: int, result_dir: str, n_sample_cell_type: int, merged_sc_dataset_file_path: str, cell_types: Optional[list] = None, gradient_range: Optional[dict] = None, dataset_name: str = '', dataset_id: Optional[list] = None, generated_sc_dataset_dir: Optional[str] = None, save_tpm: bool = False)¶

Simulating bulk GEPs by gradient sampling for each cell type

Parameters

  • n_per_gradient – the number of samples for each gradient, such as 10 samples for 5% cancer cell

  • result_dir – where to save the result

  • n_sample_cell_type – the number of cells for each cell type to generate single cell dataset, >= 500

  • merged_sc_dataset_file_path – the file path of merged dataset which contains 6 single cell datasets, merged_6_sc_datasets.h5ad

  • cell_types – a list contains all cell types to mix and generate simulated bulk GEPs. Using all valid cell types in current datasets if None.

  • gradient_range – gradient range (%) for each cell type, such as {‘CD8 T’: (1, 100)} can set gradient range from 1% to 100% for CD8 T cell. Setting gradient range from 1% to 100% for all cell types in cell_types if None.

  • dataset_name – the name of simulated bulk cell GEPs dataset

  • dataset_id – a list, subset of 6 datasets from [‘hnscc_cillo_01’, ‘pdac_pengj_02’, ‘hnscc_puram_03’, ‘pdac_steele_04’, ‘luad_kim_05’, ‘nsclc_guo_06’], use all datasets if [“all”].

  • generated_sc_dataset_dir – the folder to save generated single cell datasets

  • save_tpm – save TPM.txt if True

Returns

simulated bulk GEP saved by h5ad format

Bulk Cell Preprocessing Deconvolution
